attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks in all shops to the public
attributes.additional_details: Secure the health of living pet dogs and stop fireworks from falling into youths hands, where they think it’s fun to set fireworks off and sometimes using them for intentions they’re not for likes throwing them at cars etc
attributes.background: Ban sales of fireworks to public as when it gets to point of the year in October, youths are buying fireworks and letting them off everyday and night to run up of nov 5th causing peoples pets to have seizures or maybe even worse due to being frightened of the noise

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
